comment: The second supplement to the law of quadratic reciprocity for odd primes (common representation, see theorem 9.5 in [ApostolNT] p. 181): The Legendre symbol for ` 2 ` at an odd prime is minus one to the power of the square of the odd prime minus one divided by eight ( ` ( 2 /L P ) ` = -1^(((P^2)-1)/8) ). (Contributed by AV, 20-Jul-2021.)
